actionTemplate.title: Flat Wash Eyeshadow (Base Laydown)
steps: Sweep one main shade across the lid as a base
Build depth along the lash line and the outer V
Blend edges with a clean brush to avoid harsh blocks
Lightly highlight inner corner and brow bone

rationaleTemplate: Creates a clean base and quick depth with minimal steps.
Great for everyday looks and beginners; keeps the eye area fresh.
